How do astronauts sleep in zero gravity? Very unusual video
05 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Mikk Cid
British host of the BBC television channel Lewis Vaughan posted on the Internet a video of sleeping NASA astronauts.
This short video was shot several years ago aboard the Space Shuttle.
Reminds a crypto thriller, doesn't it?
Lewis Vaughan Jones on Twitter? I? D never seen astronauts sleeping in space before. It? S much more creepy than I imagined. https://t.co/9iyqVc70Ti? twitter.com
